entries: You target one creature within 30 feet, temporarily imposing the decrepitude of time on it. The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. The {@condition clumsy} and {@condition enfeebled} conditions last 1 minute.

entries.Success: The target becomes {@condition clumsy 1} and {@condition enfeebled 1}.
entries.Failure: The target becomes {@condition clumsy 2}, {@condition enfeebled 2}, and {@condition drained 1}.
entries.Critical Failure: The target becomes {@condition clumsy 3}, {@condition enfeebled 3}, and {@condition drained 2}.
